data.comment: In the minute -5, Diego Rubio (Colorado) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The match has started.
Houston are whistled for offside.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Colorado in the half of Houston.
Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
Colorado's Lalas Abubakar has been booked in Commerce City.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Houston are coming forward and Christian Ramirez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
Fotis Bazakos blows against Houston's Christian Ramirez for offside.
In the minute 20, Jonathan Lewis (Colorado) gets a yellow card.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
In the minute 35, Christian Ramirez for Houston is whistled offside.
The second-half has started.
The away team have replaced Wilfried Zahibo with Boniek Garcia. This is the first substitution made today by Tab Ramos.
In the minute 46, Jack Price is replacing Collen Warner for the home team.
Goal! Houston have got their heads in front thanks to a Christian Ramirez strike.
Memo Rodriguez with an assist there.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Colorado.
The away team replace Christian Ramirez with Mauro Manotas.
Ariel Lassiter is on a sub for Niko Hansen for Houston.
In the minute 58, Houston make their fifth substitution with Darwin Quintero replacing Tomas Martinez.
Colorado are caught offside.
Alejandro Fuenmayor is replacing Victor Cabrera for Houston at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 75, Robin Fraser is making the team's first substitution at Dick's Sporting Goods Park with Nicolas Benezet replacing Jonathan Lewis.
Robin Fraser (Colorado) is making a second substitution, with Cole Bassett replacing Diego Rubio.
Robin Fraser (Colorado) is making a fourth substitution, with Nicolas Mezquida replacing Kellyn Acosta.
Fotis Bazakos blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Goal! Colorado go level at 1-1 through Lalas Abubakar in Commerce City.
That's a fine assist from Sam Vines.
